params.name: note
params.description: The card's note content. Only valid for cards without another type of content, so this must be omitted if `content_id` and `content_type` are specified.

params.name: content_id
params.description: The id of the issue to associate with this card.

params.name: content_type
params.description: **Required if you specify a content_id**. The type of content to associate with this card. Can only be "Issue" at this time.
